name: Fastjobs Singapore
description: FastJobs is a fuss-free app that lets job seekers search for non-executive full-time, part-time, and contract positions on-the-go. Job seekers can register without the hassle of uploading lengthy resumes, filtering for preferred jobs, or searching for jobs using keywords. Candidates can connect instantly with prospective employers directly via phone or choose to send out an email to register their interest in a job.
features: Improve your hiring experience right here at the FastJobs Employer's Hub!
Discover jobs on our mobile app!
Launch Your Singapore Career: Browse Jobs by Industry, Skill, or Location
Headline: Find Your Dream Job in Singapore: Search Thousands of Listings Now.
ShortDescription: Connecting non-executive jobseekers to employers quickly and easily. Get Jobs FAST!

Highlights.name: Find Jobs Fast on Your Phone
Highlights.description: Perfect for busy schedules, get matched with relevant opportunities in minutes through the user-friendly mobile app.

Highlights.name: Land Your Next Gig in Singapore.
Highlights.description: No matter if it's full-time, part-time, contract, or freelance, FastJobs boasts a vast pool of non-executive roles across various industries.

Highlights.name: Boost Your Chances
Highlights.description: FastJobs uses smart tech to recommend jobs that fit your skills, increasing your chances of getting noticed by employers.  pen_spark.

enhanced_description: FastJobs Singapore is a mobile-first, fuss-free app designed to connect non-executive job seekers with employers for full-time, part-time, contract, and freelance positions across various industries within Singapore. It streamlines the job application process by allowing job seekers to register without lengthy resumes, filter jobs, or search by keywords. The platform leverages smart technology to recommend relevant job opportunities based on skills, boosting job seekers' chances of getting noticed. Candidates can connect directly with employers instantly via phone or email. For employers, FastJobs provides an Employer's Hub to improve the hiring experience by enabling quick and efficient sourcing of non-executive talent.
key_use_cases: Searching for non-executive jobs (full-time, part-time, contract, freelance)
Instant communication between job seekers and employers
Efficient and fast hiring processes for employers
competitive_advantages: Fuss-free app experience for job seekers
No lengthy resume upload required for job seekers
Instant direct connection between candidates and employers (phone/email)
Focus on speed and efficiency in hiring (for both job seekers and employers)
roi_benefits: Improved hiring speed and efficiency for employers
Faster job discovery and matching for job seekers
Increased chances of job placement for job seekers
Streamlined communication between job seekers and employers
